23 #pragma once
24 
25 #include "cinder/Cinder.h"
26 #include "cinder/Exception.h"
27 #include <vector>
28 #include <boost/preprocessor/seq.hpp>
29 
30 namespace cinder { namespace audio {
31 
32 typedef enum ChannelIdentifier {
33  CHANNEL_FRONT_LEFT = 0,
34  CHANNEL_FRONT_RIGHT = 1
35 } ChannelIdentifier;
36 
37 template<typename T>
38 struct BufferT {
39  uint32_t mNumberChannels;
40  uint32_t mDataByteSize;
41  uint32_t mSampleCount;
42  T * mData;
43 };
44 
45 typedef BufferT<void> BufferGeneric; //used for internally handing around data
46 typedef BufferT<uint8_t> Buffer8u;
47 typedef BufferT<int8_t> Buffer8i;
48 typedef BufferT<uint16_t> Buffer16u;
49 typedef BufferT<int16_t> Buffer16i;
50 typedef BufferT<int32_t> Buffer32i;
51 typedef BufferT<uint32_t> Buffer32u;
52 typedef BufferT<float> Buffer32f;
53 
54 typedef std::shared_ptr<BufferT<float> > Buffer32fRef;
55 
56 template<typename T>
57 struct BufferListT {
58  uint32_t mNumberBuffers;
59  BufferT<T> * mBuffers;
60 };
61 
62 typedef BufferListT<void> BufferList;
63 typedef BufferListT<float> BufferList32f;
64 
65 typedef std::shared_ptr<BufferList32f> BufferList32fRef;
66 
67 template<typename T>
68 class PcmBufferT {
69  public:
70  PcmBufferT( uint32_t aMaxSampleCount, uint16_t aChannelCount, bool isInterleaved );
71  ~PcmBufferT();
72 
73  uint32_t getSampleCount( ChannelIdentifier channelId = CHANNEL_FRONT_LEFT ) const { return mBufferSampleCounts[channelId]; }
74  uint32_t getMaxSampleCount() const { return mMaxSampleCount; }
75  uint16_t getChannelCount() const { return mChannelCount; }
76  bool isInterleaved() const { return mIsInterleaved; }
77 
78  std::shared_ptr<BufferT<T> > getChannelData( ChannelIdentifier channelId ) const;
79  std::shared_ptr<BufferT<T> > getInterleavedData() const;
80 
81  //TODO: add support for adding/editing data at arbitrary positions in the buffer
82  //TODO: add support for an appendData method that just accepts a Buffer or BufferList and interprets interleaving accordingly
83  void appendInterleavedData( T * aData, uint32_t aSampleCount );
84  void appendChannelData( T * aData, uint32_t aSampleCount, ChannelIdentifier channelId );
85  private:
86  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<BufferT<T> > > mBuffers;
87 
88  uint16_t mBufferCount;
89  uint32_t * mBufferSampleCounts;
90  uint32_t mMaxSampleCount;
91  uint16_t mChannelCount;
92  bool mIsInterleaved;
93 };
94 
95 typedef PcmBufferT<float> PcmBuffer32f;
96 
97 typedef std::shared_ptr<PcmBuffer32f> PcmBuffer32fRef;
98 
99 class PcmBufferException : public Exception {
100 };
101 
102 class InvalidChannelPcmBufferException : public PcmBufferException {
103 };
104 
105 class OutOfRangePcmBufferException : public PcmBufferException {
106 };
107 
108 inline void silenceBuffers( BufferList * aBufferList )
109 {
110  for( uint32_t i = 0; i < aBufferList->mNumberBuffers; i++ ) {
111  memset( aBufferList->mBuffers[i].mData, 0, aBufferList->mBuffers[i].mDataByteSize );
112  }
113 }
114 
115 template<typename T>
116 void deleteBuffer( BufferT<T> * aBuffer );
117 
118 template<typename T>
119 std::shared_ptr<BufferListT<T> > createBufferList( uint32_t sampleCount, uint16_t channelCount, bool isInterleaved );
120 
121 template<typename T>
122 void deleteBufferList( BufferListT<T> * aBufferList );
123 
124 #define AUDIO_DATA_TYPES (uint8_t)(int16_t)(int32_t)(float)
